_description: National reactions to ?a political event, or stereotypes — four macaronic monorhyming lines

CamTCC600.Transcription:
Italicis Olilant Lombardes weymentenTheotonicis Clamant
                    Duchemen cryenGallicis Cantant ffrenshmen singenAnglicis
                        subilant And Englisshmen Joyessen Videte
